recipes.name: Sicilian Caponata
recipes.instructions:
Heat the olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add diced eggplants, sauté 10 min until golden.
Stir in celery, capers, olives and cook 5 min.
Add tomato passata, vinegar, sugar; simmer 20 min.
Season, let cool; serve with fresh basil.
